Message.Title: Emeryville CA police chief re gun control
Message.Msg: Guns can’t be used for defense, said the police chief in Emeryville, Calif. They can only be used to show power and dominance, he said, at a press conference to promote tighter gun-control laws in California. “One issue that always boggles my mind is that the idea that a gun is a defensive weapon,” said Emeryville Police Chief Ken James, according to a report in The Blaze. They are rather “offensive weapon[s] used to intimidate and used to show power.” ......................................................................................................................................................................... really? So this Chief of Police wants the public to think of his police force nas intimidators for the purpose of power and dominance?? Interesting perspective this guy has.

Topic.Title: IN DEPTH ORCL Analyst Report .

Message.Msg: good report! thanks

Message.Msg: Put it this way seebe,,, guns USUALLY are used to destroy .............................................................................................................................................................. By whom, drop/ Who is most likely to use a gun for destructin? Is the law abiding citizen or the criminal? That clown police chief didn't differentiate. What a moron that guy is. Interesting that he suggested his police department be viewed as an intimidating dominant bunch.

Topic.Title: rightwing hero george zimmerman needs more money

Message.Msg: "Hero?" Not hardly but I do think he's getting a bad rap. Wonder how you would react charged with a felony murder? Interesting how the "news" media falsified soi many things about this case even to doctoring Zimmerman's picture to make him look white with blue eyes. Did any of the major media even report what two eyewitnesses said that corroborated his story? A local radio station did and I heard it on their web site.

Topic.Title: Emeryville CA police chief re gun control

Message.Msg: His mind is boggled alright. Cops can;t be everywhere so what is the public supposed use for protection, tomatos? If guns are not defensive weapons, why do the police have them and how did this guy make chief? How many crimes could have been stopped if a gun was used defensively?

Topic.Title: Emeryville CA police chief re gun control

Message.Msg: one thing is for sure, Annie. The Chief is Police is subordinate to an elected official. That makes him a politician who may be fired if he doesn't tow the party line. Note the difference between appointed Chiefs of Police who answer to an elected pol and elected Sheriffs who answer to the people. Think Joe Arpaio. Think Sheriff Clark in Milwaukee County Wisc. who made a PSA encouraging people to arm themselves.
